post.text: THANK YOU West Palm Beach, Florida! We will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Kaylee
comment.text: The wheels on the trump train have finally come off!! Trumps goose is cooked!' Say good by to Mr Crotch Grabber!!

replies.author: John
replies.text: Nice comment on here Kaylee, I agree with you, send me a friend request on here, I would be glad to chat.

replies.author: Kaylee
replies.text: "Heir Groper" is a great rock band name!!!!
